registration.b2b.company_name.invalid: Please enter your Company Name as it will appear on your invoice.
registration.b2b.comp_exist_t:
It looks like {{ name }} is already registered with Distrelec.
You can register as a new contact on this account by continuing below.
registration.b2b.search_info_t: Showing company results for "{{ company }}" in {{ country }}
registration.b2b.cust_no_not_found:
The customer number/company name can't be found. Your company name needs to be as it appears on your invoice. If you can't remember your customer number, please contact us at info@distrelec.com.
You can also find our phone number here.
registration.b2c.customer_help_t: You can find this on your invoices or delivery notes
registration.general.welcome_subtitle: All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated
registration.general.have_account_q: Do you have an account with Distrelec already?
registration.general.customer_help_t: You can find this on your invoices or delivery notes
registration.general.country_help_t: If your country is not listed please contact customer service
registration.comm_pref.title: Communication Preferences
registration.comm_pref.receive_email: I would like to receive communications by email
registration.comm_pref.receive_email_des: We would like to keep you up-to-date with news, events, offers, newproducts, promotions, and catalogues. We may also send you personalised recommendations as well as feedback surveys to understand more about you and your experience with Distrelec.
registration.comm_pref.receive_sms: I would like to receive communications by SMS
registration.comm_pref.receive_phone: I would like to receive communications by phone
registration.comm_pref.receive_post: I would like to receive communications by post
registration.comm_pref.receive_marketing: I would like to receive communication via phone / sms / post to hear / receive information about new brands, products, services and promotions.
registration.comm_pref.receive_person_co: I would like to receive personalised communications based on my account information, on-site activity and purchase history
Based on your interactions with the web shop, sales, product and brand preferences Distrelec would like to personalise your experience with Distrelec.
registration.comm_pref.receive_profiling: I am happy for Distrelec to combine my data with data from it's partners to deliver an enhanced customer experience both on the web shop and on other websites

Distrelec would like to match profiling data from third parties such as Google, LinkedIn, Facebook and other trusted partners to help us select content that fits your interests that Distrelec will display in communications on our websites and within third part and partner sites.
registration.comm_pref.data.choice: Your data, your choice - details on processing of your personal data can be found in our Privacy Policy.
registration.comm_pref.change_pref_help_: You can change your communication preferences at any time after registering.
registration.comm_pref.accept_t_and_c: I accept the Terms and Conditions. Details on the processing of your personal data can be found in our Privacy Policy.
registration.comm_pref.t_and_c_help_t: You must accept these terms before registering.
registration.comm_pref.data_par_1: The Distrelec privacy policy explains when and why we collect personal information about you, how we use it, how we keep it secure and your right to see or remove the data we hold about you.
registration.comm_pref.data_par_2: Please note that you can revoke your consent for the below stated communications as well as your consent for personalisation and/or profiling at any time with effect for the future e.g. by visiting this preference centre and manage your preferences or by contacting us via email to data@distrelec.com or our contact channels.
registration.comm_pref.data_par_3: If you have any questions or concerns about how we use your data please contact data@distrelec.com
registration.comm_pref.data_par_5: You can change your communication preferences at any time in the 'my account' section of the web shop.
registration.cust_exist: Registration for an existing customer failed because the customer and the contact is already existing!
registration.error.account.exists.title: An account already exists for this email address.
registration.vatId.validationMessage: The VAT ID must contain some digits
